rules_text:
Effigy
Menace, trample
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature or artifact. If a player does, tap this creature and put a blood counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature has three or more blood counters on it, remove all of them and transform it.
rules_text2:
Menace, trample
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{B}{R},  Sacrifice a Blood: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.
